meanings.definition: A person who believes in and promotes the truth or benefits of an idea or theory.
meanings.sent1: She is known as an exponents of environmental conservation.
meanings.sent2: The exponents of renewable energy advocate for its widespread use.
meanings.sent3: The exponents of healthy eating always bring their own snacks.
meanings.sent4: He was the exponents of positivity in our group, always spreading cheer.
meanings.sent5: The exponents of kindness make the world a better place.

meanings.definition: A symbol or number placed above and to the right of another symbol or number to indicate the power to which the base is raised.
meanings.sent1: In math class, we learned how to work with exponents in equations.
meanings.sent2: Exponents are used to show repeated multiplication in mathematics.
meanings.sent3: The teacher's pet cat accidentally sat on the exponent key of the calculator.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of exponents soared after attending the workshop.
meanings.sent5: Understanding exponents is crucial for solving advanced math problems.
